## 인디언 포커 
```{r}
rm(list = ls())

"1번 승리자" <- "w1" 
"2번 승리자" <- "w2"  
"무효" <- "0"

card1 <- 1:10
card2 <- 1:10

indian <- function() { 
  a <- head(sample(card1),1)
  b <- head(sample(card2),1)
  if (a > b) { 
    Sys.sleep(1)
    print(a)
    print(b)
    print("w1") 
  } else if (a < b) {
    Sys.sleep(1)
    print(a)
    print(b)
    print("w2") 
  } else { 
    print(a)
    print(b)
    print("0") 
  }
}

table(replicate(5, indian()))
```
